S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4543: CLOB values incorrectly stored on disk using the old header format
Aadded missing !-operator in EmbedPreparedStatement. Replaced DD_VERSION_CURRENT with DD_VERSION_DERBY_10_5. Renamed several methods and variables (stop using soft-upgrade mode term, use stream header format instead).
Patch file: derby-4543-1a-clob_hdr_format_fix.diff
